title: Website crawling
snippet:
I need to crawl the website manageo.fr in order to retrieve all companies listed in this part of the site http://www.manageo.fr/annuaire-entreprises-departements.html.

The delivery will be 3 csv files by departements (97 departments) :
- a file with companies data
- a file with companies managers
- a file with companies balance sheet

description of a company file line:
- legal id (<= unique identifier)
- name
- address
- postal code
- city
- headquarter nic
- legal form
- creation date
- capital 
- NAF code

description of a manager file line:
- company legal id
- name
- role

description of balance sheet file line:
- company legal id
- date
- duration
- name
- value

I give you an example for each file type.
